mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HIT) VALUES (NULL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{boardWriter}, now(), 0)
INSERT INTO NOTICEFILES (FILE_NUM, ORI_NAME, SAVE_NAME, BOARD_NUM) VALUES (NULL, #{oriName}, #{saveName}, #{boardNum})
